---
title: "Seurat中的数据可视化方法"
---


> 原文：[*Data visualization methods in Seurat*](https://satijalab.org/seurat/articles/visualization_vignette)
>
> 原文发布日期：2023-10-31

We'll demonstrate visualization techniques in Seurat using our previously computed Seurat object from the 2,700 PBMC tutorial. You can download this dataset from [SeuratData](https://github.com/satijalab/seurat-data)。官方教程是通过`SeuratData`包的`InstallData`函数来下载案例数据，可能需要开启全局代理才能下载：


::: {.cell hash='data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_4a0f7c96c48c62caee11f5f282661d47'}

````{.cell-code}
```{{r}}
#| eval: false
devtools::install_github('satijalab/seurat-data')
SeuratData::InstallData("pbmc3k")
```
````
:::

::: {.cell hash='data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_610743fccec69f9717b9dbc25dffce81'}

````{.cell-code}
```{{r}}
#| eval: false
library(SeuratData)
pbmc3k.final <- LoadData("pbmc3k", type = "pbmc3k.final")
pbmc3k.final$groups <- sample(c("group1", 
                                "group2"), 
                              size = ncol(pbmc3k.final), 
                              replace = TRUE)
pbmc3k.final
```
````
:::


这里我将下载下来的数据保存起来：


::: {.cell hash='data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_05db33850ab867bd62245b9f6ce683a7'}

````{.cell-code}
```{{r}}
#| eval: false
saveRDS(pbmc3k.final, file = "data/seurat_official/pbmc3k.final.rds")
```
````
:::


后面我们直接从本地读取这个Seurat对象：


::: {.cell hash='data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_a0b288e8ca3d15c149ba6ec766c3ffaf'}

```{.r .cell-code}
pbmc3k.final <- readRDS("data/seurat_official/pbmc3k.final.rds")
```
:::


# 5种可视化marker gene的方法

定义要检查的marker gene：


::: {.cell hash='data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_440c2724bea340ef113ca955b8ef4d1c'}

```{.r .cell-code}
features <- c("LYZ", "CCL5", "IL32", "PTPRCAP", "FCGR3A", "PF4")
```
:::


## Ridge plots

Ridge plots - from ggridges. Visualize single cell expression distributions in each cluster


::: {.cell hash='data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_908042c0151b7aeecbca0979337e49cd'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(Seurat)
RidgePlot(pbmc3k.final, features = features, ncol = 2)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=960}
:::
:::


## Violin plot


::: {.cell hash='data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_16d54170a20c5aacc9354040a71e4058'}

```{.r .cell-code}
VlnPlot(pbmc3k.final, features = features)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=960}
:::
:::


Violin plots can be split on some variable. Simply add the splitting variable to object metadata and pass it to the `split.by` argument. 通过添加`split.by`参数，展示marker gene在不同的样本组别中的表达。


::: {.cell hash='data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-8_584ced3cab42935fa48a0c4905d1a48b'}

```{.r .cell-code}
VlnPlot(pbmc3k.final, 
        features = "percent.mt", 
        split.by = "groups")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Feature plot

Visualize feature expression in low-dimensional space


::: {.cell hash='data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-9_3c54a8da978d0b19c87d0f265b64512f'}

```{.r .cell-code}
FeaturePlot(pbmc3k.final, features = features)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=768}
:::
:::


### 对`FeaturePlot`的进一步修饰 {#sec-Further_modifications_to_featureplot}

原始图像：


::: {.cell hash='data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-10_704dd11f76cab1acb4d81d3acd3a554a'}

```{.r .cell-code}
FeaturePlot(pbmc3k.final, features = "MS4A1")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-10-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


Adjust the contrast in the plot。通过`min.cutoff`和`max.cutoff`调整颜色范围。


::: {.cell hash='data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-11_a59bca5618e3b2cf072d9170aed5a162'}

```{.r .cell-code}
FeaturePlot(pbmc3k.final, features = "MS4A1", 
            min.cutoff = 1, max.cutoff = 3)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


**调整颜色：**


::: {.cell hash='data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-12_187f9a6400818bdc2886dc79a8dfd21b'}

```{.r .cell-code}
FeaturePlot(pbmc3k.final, features = "MS4A1", cols = c("lightblue", "red"))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-12-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# 通过RColorBrewer包取色
library(RColorBrewer)
FeaturePlot(pbmc3k.final, features = "MS4A1", cols = brewer.pal(n = 10, name = "RdBu"))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-12-2.png){width=672}
:::
:::


也可以通过ggplot语法修改颜色：


::: {.cell hash='data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-13_eb059a13ca647ee13889030d4cc7b524'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggplot2)
FeaturePlot(pbmc3k.final, features = "MS4A1") +
  scale_colour_gradientn(colours = rev(brewer.pal(n = 10, name = "RdBu")))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-13-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


Calculate feature-specific contrast levels based on quantiles of non-zero expression. Particularly useful when plotting multiple markers。


::: {.cell hash='data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-14_8be2b78fecb8776cb049aa1425b0372f'}

```{.r .cell-code}
FeaturePlot(pbmc3k.final, 
            features = c("MS4A1", "PTPRCAP"), 
            min.cutoff = "q10", 
            max.cutoff = "q90")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-14-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


**多基因FeaturePlot：**

通过添加`split.by`参数，来按照不同的样本组别来分别展示marker gene的表达。


::: {.cell hash='data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-15_916cd3971086f3cf6f43df9cdc1f6c25'}

```{.r .cell-code}
FeaturePlot(pbmc3k.final, 
            features = c("CD3D", "MS4A1", "CD79A"), 
            split.by = "groups")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-15-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


`FeaturePlot()`中还提供了`blend` 参数，来可视化两个基因的共表达情况（添加`blend = TRUE`）。注意`blend = TRUE`**只能适用于2个基因**，多个基因会报错 。


::: {.cell hash='data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-16_04c9534e8b0ba3b40804bd986761edad'}

```{.r .cell-code}
FeaturePlot(pbmc3k.final, 
            features = c("MS4A1", "CD79A"), 
            blend = TRUE)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-16-1.png){width=960}
:::
:::


如果想实现多个基因的话，可以使用`scCustomize`包中的`Plot_Density_Joint_Only()`函数绘制多基因联合密度图。该函数还依赖于Nebulosa包，因此还需要先从BiocManager安装该包：


::: {.cell hash='data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-17_5d57bde7279acd7c1eb6aa551f5dca29'}

```{.r .cell-code}
install.packages("scCustomize")
BiocManager::install("Nebulosa")
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-18_a28e9353cf13231a100df7cec99708a3'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(scCustomize)
Plot_Density_Joint_Only(seurat_object = pbmc3k.final, 
                        features = c("CD3D", "MS4A1", "CD79A"),
                        custom_palette = BlueAndRed())
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-18-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Dot plots

The **size** of the dot corresponds to **the percentage of cells expressing the feature in each cluster**. The **color** represents the **average expression level**


::: {.cell hash='data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-19_4365cd57624aad54c621cfe063e4f680'}

```{.r .cell-code}
DotPlot(pbmc3k.final, 
        features = features) + 
  RotatedAxis()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-19-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


通过添加`split.by`参数，来按照不同的样本组别来分别展示marker gene的表达。


::: {.cell hash='data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-20_85c94759fc298bb3253c0d2076a5fd45'}

```{.r .cell-code}
DotPlot(pbmc3k.final, 
        features = features, 
        split.by = "groups") + 
  RotatedAxis()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-20-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Heatmap


::: {.cell hash='data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-21_57e350639a05dad39d2b1e5b7e1fa2ba'}

```{.r .cell-code}
DoHeatmap(subset(pbmc3k.final, downsample = 100), 
          features = features, 
          size = 3)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-21-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


DoHeatmap now shows a grouping bar, splitting the heatmap into groups or clusters. This can be changed with the `group.by` parameter. 默认的`group.by`为细胞分群信息，即按照细胞的分群作为分组依据来绘制热图：


::: {.cell hash='data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-22_f3f3d9eecede881fb9ba643a92886c34'}

```{.r .cell-code}
DoHeatmap(pbmc3k.final, 
          features = VariableFeatures(pbmc3k.final)[1:30], 
          cells = 1:1000, 
          size = 4, # 分组文字的大小
          angle = 45) +  # 分组文字角度
  NoLegend()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-22-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


我们用meta.data中的任何列作为分群依据。例如这里的"groups"列：


::: {.cell hash='data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-23_995f9ff5afbf8406d6b6cea9015ac38b'}

```{.r .cell-code}
colnames(pbmc3k.final@meta.data)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "orig.ident"         "nCount_RNA"         "nFeature_RNA"      
[4] "seurat_annotations" "percent.mt"         "RNA_snn_res.0.5"   
[7] "seurat_clusters"    "groups"            
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
DoHeatmap(pbmc3k.final, 
          features = VariableFeatures(pbmc3k.final)[1:30], 
          group.by = "groups",
          cells = 1:1000, 
          size = 4, # 分组文字的大小
          angle = 0) +  # 分组文字角度
  NoLegend()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-23-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


# 细胞分群图


::: {.cell hash='data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-24_4fbdc496a7a8ca3f34ca96e8fad08bd5'}

```{.r .cell-code}
DimPlot(pbmc3k.final, reduction = "pca")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-24-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
DimPlot(pbmc3k.final, reduction = "umap")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-24-2.png){width=672}
:::
:::


进一步修饰


::: {.cell hash='data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-25_af8778094d37bdb74a69f34aa9557776'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggplot2)
DimPlot(pbmc3k.final, reduction = "umap") + 
  labs(title = "Clustering of 2,700 PBMCs") +
  theme_bw()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](data_visualization_methods_in_seurat_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-25-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
